research.description: Investigates source material, synthesizes findings with citations, and extracts key signals from noisy corpora.

finance.description: Performs quantitative analysis over market data, forecasts trends, and contextualizes financial risk for decisions.

creative.description: Transforms insights into narratives, visual-ready summaries, and audience-tailored storytelling artifacts.

enterprise.description: Produces executive-ready recommendations, policy-aware action plans, and cross-functional alignment guidance.
